43120417.name: Claire
43120417.textcomments:
Awesome store I want to take Robert home with me !! So professional and knowledgeable 
I went with my 90 year old mom and senior poodle even my mom raved about him 
This is the only place to go if you are serious about getting a quality vacuum !!

41445647.name: Peter B
41445647.textcomments:
....Gatorvac is awesome.   They replaced my central vacuum unit a year ago and troubleshot a broken outlet wire in the attic at the same time.   Their prices are fair, and they show up on time.
.....recently one of my pvc vacuum lines came off, and I was getting low suction.   Robert spent a half hour on the phone troubleshooting the problem with me, no charge.   
.....honest, old school business.  Rare to see anymore.

40242049.name: Ellen K
40242049.textcomments: Have purchased and serviced  my Miele vacuum cleaner at Gator.  In fact, this is the second one I bought from them. They are very knowledgeable and carry bags, hepa filters and anything else you may need.

39857959.name: Linda
39857959.textcomments:
I have an old featherweight Singer machine that I can't trust to just anyone.  It's a simple, wonderful machine and it broke...
I took it to Gator Vac and Sewing and it was back home in just a few days, in better condition than it was before it broke.  It's been working like a charm ever since.  
I am so thankful for this business and their expertise!!!

38863209.name: Anonymous Customer
38863209.textcomments: Joey & Ben did an excellent job upgrading our central vaccum system as part of a renovation.  Looks and works like a gem thanks to the professionalism and personal caring of these great guys.  Highly recommend.  Responsive, professional and great products...

38700592.name: Michael
38700592.textcomments: Wow! I called and explain that my whole house vacuum system would not work. They said they would send a technician out in about two hours. Joe and Ben showed up within two hours, diagnosed the unit and found that the motor on the 10 year old unit was fried. They had units on the truck with them and I was able to choose a replacement unit that fit my needs perfectly. They removed the old unit installed the new one and I was up and running in about thirty minutes. The technicians were friendly, polite , honest and knowledgeable. It doesn't get any better than this. Gator Vacuum is my new best friend!

36538198.name: Jay
36538198.textcomments:
I came to Gator Vacuum for a repair and the owner was excellent and gave me an honest overview of the vacuum I brought in. Suggested different models that would do what I needed for my Condo. Knowing the brand I most prefer that he sold I looked to purchase a new model. He suggested based on my actual needs, to consider one of the used reconditioned models of my brand preference. Perfect! A savings for me even though a lesser purchase price sale for Gator. Just took the unit in for the recommended servicing to keep it optimal.
The very best in honest service!

33913143.name: Nadine H
33913143.textcomments:
Don't settle for less....When you can have THE BEST!!!!!!
            Now is the age of mega department stores, and mediocre service and just "ok" quality products.
            But if you want commitment to excellent customer service and a dedication to top of the line inventory you need to come meet Robert and his mom Phyllis. The owners for decades of Gator Vac & Sewing in Coral Springs.
            For nearly 20 years Robert and his staff "lovingly" took care of my Miele Vacuum. He will know you and he will certainly knows what will fit your needs at any given time. The service is personal and friendly and his lines of superior cleaning have a reputation for excellence that can not be matched be matched by the come and go super stores of today.
            Do yourself a great service and drop by-- Meet their team and learn about what truly will make your life easier and healthier. They are the best, and you can forget the rest.

                Sincerely Yours,
                         Nadine Hankin
                         1200 NW 80th Ave
                         Apt 104
                         Margate, FL 33063

32639035.name: Patti's S
32639035.textcomments: I have had my 45-year-old Singer sewing machine serviced twice at Gator...once for cleaning and, just  recently, for a repair and complete overhaul. Both times my machine has come back sewing like new. I feel fortunate to have a place like Gator to service my machine.  They don't make them like they used to and I want to keep this one as long as I can. I just hope they are around as long as my machine!!

30597180.name: Ken M
30597180.textcomments: Recently realized while trying to vacuum myself, not done for a long while that 15 year old Sanitaire Commercial heavy duty upright that had magnets in front to catch staples and paper clips used to use in office, had torn bag and broken belt. Tried cleaning and fixing myself after finding replacement belt had in a box. After doing this and saw rollers tight tried it and in a minute or so belt broke. So fortunately found Gator on line took the Sanitaire and Eureka Mighty Mite for bag and tools to great store and Robert totally refurbished Sanitaire at reasonable price and both vacuums working great and like new  Ken Meyer Tamarac

27403044.name: Steve E
27403044.textcomments: Gator Vacuum is the best local supply store for vacuum needs.  Their staff are super friendly and knowledgeable and eager to assist.  I cannot say enough about them, they are truly the best.

27162170.name: Efrezer
27162170.textcomments: Great job fixing Dyson. Quick and affordable. Knowledgeable customer service.

26184789.name: Judy J
26184789.textcomments: I love Gator vacuum!  I have been going there for years. They are so knowledgable about all of their products. Sharon knows everything about the products. She is so friendly too.  I trust them completely. They service my vacuum every 6 mos. and should I ever need a new one, you can bet I will be getting one from there. They have so much wonderful inventory.  Check out gator vacuum. They are awesome!

25068434.name: Frank
25068434.textcomments: My overall shopping experience was excellent.  Ben and Joe were running a little late, but they called, which I appreciated.  They diagnosed the problem (my central vac was overheating and turning off).  They showed me the damage done to the motor and recommended rebuilding the motor or getting a new central vacuum.  I opted for the new machine which they had on the truck.  The installation went smoothly and took less time than anticipated.  They were efficient and clean.  With so many accolades, why didn't I rate Gator Vac 5 stars?  The one negative, which basically isn't the fault of Gator Vac, is that I was unable to shop around.  I could not compare prices.  Whomever I called to come to my home would get the job. To call another company would cost me another service charge.  I choose to be optimistic and conclude that I made the right decision.

24820356.name: Dawn
24820356.textcomments:
Once again, Gator Vacuum to the rescue!  A number of months ago, my PowerStar Optima Plus (central vac) decided to no longer work after a few weeks of acting "tempermental." I called a number of supposed repair facilities--including original installer--who each made clear they were more interested in selling me new vs. repairing my not very old existing system.  
Gator Vac sent a servicemen out--same day--who quickly performed a systems diagnosis; id'd "the problem"; & made recommendations re appropriate overhaul procedures. End of day--my vacuum like brand new! 
Today, called around, looking for bags & was told by 2 different companies that my vacuum was discontinued & bags no longer available--would I like to consider a new vac system? 
Found Gator Vac's no. & correct bags--plentiful supply--is now on the way to my house: No fuss/no muss--just GREAT service & VERY PLEASANT/HELPFUL people.  Nice!

23573250.name: Marcia
23573250.textcomments: This group is great,fair, and reasonably priced group! Highly recommend them!great people

23021835.name: Linda W
23021835.textcomments: Wonderful people very knowledgeable, helpful and honest.

22844282.name: MV
22844282.textcomments: Very efficient and professional.  They also were very friendly.  I recommend you use them for central Vaccuum needs.

22843040.name: Roy D
22843040.textcomments: We originally purchased our new vac from this company through Iris. And when we vacation in Florida, we stop in to get bags and any other accessories we need for home. Quick, easy and friendly. Will continue to come back.

22799053.name: Carol
22799053.textcomments: I have been a patron of this business for many years. The service has always been consistently excellent. It is a pleasure doing business with this establishment.

22642506.name: Darlene
22642506.textcomments: Excellent customer service and very professional. Customer is always first which in this day and age is hard to find.

22641376.name: Alida
22641376.textcomments: 6 years ago you fixed my old sewing machine and still works perfect. Now my daughter in law has problems with her vac cleaner...I told my daughter inlaw to come here because I know you will fix the vac cleaner.

22506140.name: Cheryl m
22506140.textcomments: Gator vacuum is a family owned business that cares about service and their customers.  Great products and great service.

22483255.name: Mike
22483255.textcomments:
Very easy, the website provided all of the information needed to make the decision to come here.

Eevery thing I needed was in stock and the staff had great sugestions.

22438973.name: L E
22438973.textcomments: Been coming to Gator for 20 years they always have taken good care of us

22256815.name: Susan
22256815.textcomments: I highly recommend Gator Vacuum.  They have provided excellent service and always do a great job at servicing my vacuum.  - Susan H.

22188898.name: HL
22188898.textcomments: Great overall experience. Staff took time to explain problem and was bery flexible with pricing. Great overall experience. Highly recommended.

22187228.name: Jan
22187228.textcomments:
We have had a long relationship with this company and always is satisfactory. They know how to take care of all things that 
Have to do with vaccums.

22166817.name: Nina
22166817.textcomments: Pleasant and professional. Job completed in a timely manner. Pleased with service

22165910.name: Kathy h
22165910.textcomments: Excellent service . Sharon was very  knowledgeable and helpful in my service needs. Highly recommend Gator vacuum . I have been a customer for 23 years.

22149142.name: Linda
22149142.textcomments: Great experience, customer service & time spent with us was above & beyond.

22018966.name: Deluxe C
22018966.textcomments: As always the best equipment for less, great people. Great selection. I wouid not go any where else. The best.  :)

21870110.name: Betsy
21870110.textcomments: I love these guys! They had me serviced in an hour! Plus they always remember me by name!

21853564.name: Iris
21853564.textcomments: Great service, vacuum looked better than when I purchased it! Helpful staff and so quickly done. Highly Recommend them!

21854639.name: Bill G
21854639.textcomments: Great staff, Great selection got the vacuum my wife wanted was in and out in no time!

21853646.name: Fran stern
21853646.textcomments: I got great service at gator vacuum for my Miele and I can not wait to come back for my service!

21618912.name: Lisa S
21618912.textcomments: Happy my sewing machine was fixed quickly and was reasonable! Thanks.

21439996.name: Anonymous Customer
21439996.textcomments:
Sharon in the office was very accommodating. 
The staff that installed the vacuums were professional and very knowledgeable.  
Thank you both for making this an easy and enjoyable purchase.

20370214.name: Jo
20370214.textcomments: The always provide great service, I great place to do business.

20303441.name: Jon
20303441.textcomments: Really great people.  They installed our central vac a couple of years ago.  The vac is fine and when I have  called for service or a problem Sharon has always tried to solve it over the phone so as to avoid service charges.  I had to replace the hose since it got an unfixable clog.  They tried clearing it but couldn't either.  They gave me a new one for a very good price.  They take very good care of their customers.  Highly recommended!

20042004.name: Shari
20042004.textcomments: Great service great people, great vacuums

19972477.name: Lynn
19972477.textcomments: These folks really know household products!  They are well stocked and very up to date on every vacuum, vacuum parts.  I did not know there were so many useful and practical attachments for my old central vacuum!  I am so excited to use my new attachments and my house will be fresh and clean.

19915795.name: Anonymous Customer
19915795.textcomments: Always very helpful. Love the service!! Staff is ALWAYS a pleasure!!!!

19848761.name: Deluxe Professional Cleaning S
19848761.textcomments: Really nice knowledgable sales staff. Great selection. Well organized.

18318544.name: jeff
18318544.textcomments: Great Store Great Service Great Vacuums

16557769.name: Geoff
16557769.textcomments: I have purchased three vacuums from Gator Vacuum.  Two for myself, and one for my daughter.  I think Rob and Sharon are absolutely the BEST! You won't find more knowlegable professionals anywhere in South Florida. My new SEBO is a great machine, and it is packed with features that you won't find in many other vacuums. Rob took the time once again to discuss all the features and benefits of my new SEBO. Gator Vacuum is by far, hands down, the very best place to go if you are considering buying a new vacuum. Kudos to Rob and his team of professionals at Gator Vacuum. Thanks for being the BEST!!  Geoff in Coral Springs

15126560.name: Liz
15126560.textcomments:
BEST EXPERIENCE EVER!I have used another company for 13 years for my central vacuum and their service became terrible. I called Nutune to get a name for another company to use. They gave me the name of Gator Vacuum. I spoke to Sharon and she was extremely nice and helpful. She had the service guy Todd call me. In a couple days he came from Coral Springs to Miami. Not only did Todd fix the problem but he was honest, friendly and gave us great customer service. I was only charged for the service call and they fixed my central vacuum that had been broken for 3 months. Sharon also followed through the whole process. 
Customer Service is the most important thing in any company. Gator Vacuum not only has the best customer service they went over and beyond to make me happy. I will definitely use them again and get my new vacuum with them when needed. LOVE GATOR VACUUM!!!

12324450.name: Andrea S
12324450.textcomments:
Hello potential Miele vacuum shoppers.....I have never written a review before (can you tell)....but I have a heartfelt, completely honest one for you. An incredibly knowledgeable, friendly woman, Sharon spent alot of time with me on the phone, right after I dropped my Miele vacuum and well it was beyond repairing.
I have tripped over, stepped on, dropped down a carpeted staircase and not a scratch before, but this day was different.
It fell out of my suv and fell upon concrete. As I was on a job, I needed to replace it asap. Sharon listened and after anwsering many questions, she came through with the perfect deal for me. She gave me an incredible deal, shared helpful tips about things I never knew about my vacuum and sent it out immediately.
It arrived well packaged, it was truly a blessing as I needed to continue working and I never missed a beat.
For heavens sake, if you are in the market for a new vacuum, there is no other like a Miele. I have been a customer for 15 years and they are the best. Turn your t.v. off when those Dyson or Shark commericals come on.....get a Miele and ask to speak to Sharon at the retail store. She is so wonderful, I promise....she will give you the time, have the answers to all your questions and after all, how many of you actually recieve customer service like that anymore? Thanks Sharon, love Thinkvacuum.com and my miele.

11721620.name: Gina
11721620.textcomments: I purchased a Miele vacuum two years ago and I absolutely love it! The best vacuum that I have ever owned! The experience with the Gator Vacuum staff was fabulous! I highly recommend Gator Vacuum to all my friends!!!

10160519.name: Anonymous Customer
10160519.textcomments: Very good warranty service on in house vacuum head

9931650.name: Smh
9931650.textcomments: Nicest vacuum store I have ever seen...love my Miele and they do a great job of keeping my vacuum like new.

9827224.name: S sniff
9827224.textcomments: Love my miele ... Can't live without it!!!!

9824992.name: Rich
9824992.textcomments: I love coming here and the service is always great. The staff is honest and the work always reliable. I highly recommend gator vacuum,

9761423.name: Renee A
9761423.textcomments:
You have the best customer service in coral springs.
I have been coming here for years and everyone is so willing to help me every time I come in.

9760203.name: Beth G
9760203.textcomments: Gator Vaccuum is the only place I would trust with my Electrolux Vaccuum needs! We come from boca raton and would trust no other!

9748190.name: Debbie H
9748190.textcomments: The staff are always willing to help, extremely knowledge and polite. Ben came for a service call and was  very professional. Took care of the issue promptly.

9751018.name: Mary A
9751018.textcomments: Very friendly service. Fixed my vacuum on the spot.

9749751.name: BrookerF
9749751.textcomments:
Service was excellent
Ben was extremely helpful in fixing and showing me how to use the machine.
Sharon and Robert were very friendly and always were there to help.
I have used Gator Vaccuum in the past for both my vacuums and sewing machines.

9734054.name: Myra H
9734054.textcomments: Great service friendly knowledgable staff. Happy to recommend this place.

9717818.name: Leigh
9717818.textcomments: Had my Miele for years, love this store, love my vacuum.

9720416.name: Doreen
9720416.textcomments: Love my vac and the service.

9662692.name: Denise
9662692.textcomments: Always efficient and honest. Get the job done quickly also.

9625403.name: Linda d
9625403.textcomments: I love this store, come here all the time service is awesome...wouldn't go anywhere else.

9626199.name: Pablo
9626199.textcomments: The service was amazing.   The Staff is super knowledgable , and more than willing to help you get the right vacuum. I would highly recommend them to anyone looking for great service and top notch vacuums.  Great people.

9625487.name: Mike
9625487.textcomments: They always provide excellent service and are very knowledgeable.

9626279.name: Benjamin C
9626279.textcomments: Great service had a wonderful experience I will do business with them again

9626066.name: Mary brown
9626066.textcomments: My family has been going to Gator Vacuum for years. The owner & staff are personable & knowledgeable. I love their service plan. My 5 yr old Miele vacuum cleaner still runs like new.

9625594.name: Marianne
9625594.textcomments:
Love the customer service in this store.  We buy all of our cleaning supplies here as well as our vacuum supplies.  
I am a repeat customer.

9606634.name: Cheryl C
9606634.textcomments: Robert and Sharon are always helpful when I need service or supplies for my Sebo and all my cleaning needs.  I wish they had a location closer to me but they are worth the drive.

9564748.name: Colleen
9564748.textcomments: Very knowledgeable and very courteous!  Thank u!

9566134.name: Brian
9566134.textcomments: Very knowledgeable and very pleasant staff. Very clean store. I come here for all my sewing and vacuum needs

9565124.name: Rodney and Pat
9565124.textcomments:
Great experience with Sharon showing us what we really needed to understand about buying a vacuum. We brought the Miele and are very pleased with our purchase. We came into Gator Vacuum to buy a vacuum and we left having brought a vacuum service.
Rodney and Pat
Coral Springs, FL

9567470.name: Myrtle
9567470.textcomments: Excellent honest service.  I have been here 15 years and will remain a customer.

9543306.name: Carloschaos754
9543306.textcomments: I was so surprised how great the store and service was. I have had my central vacuum for over 20years ,and it finally croaked. Rob and Sharon were so courteous and knowledgable . They gave me a great deal on a new unit and attachments. I shopped around and Gator vacuum was by far the lowest price. On top of it all , the store front was so clean and beautiful . Wow. I am so happy with my new system ,and I know I Have a great location to go for all my future stuff . When my wifes happy , Im happy ! Thanks Gator Vacuum!

9543641.name: Robert A
9543641.textcomments: Sharon was extremely helpful as well as knowledgeable.
